## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>PER3, RCI3, RCI3A</u>
- **Gene Name:** PEROXIDASE 3, RARE COLD INDUCIBLE GENE 3
- **Description:**   Peroxidase superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
